episode: Sometimes I become annoyed with myself, due to the fact that I live alone and can't find a way to get out more. I mean I have all the freedom in the world, but I just find things to keep be occupied at home.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I become annoyed with myself because I have the feeling I am become sedate in my lifestyle.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a pretty introspective concern, what makes you feel that way?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I find things to do at home, that I care about, but just feel I should get out more. But I have tons of excuses not to do so.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Excuses can be tough to overcome, what's the main thing holding you back?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Well, these surveys for one. I am on a fixed income and need the miniscule earnings to supplement my fixed income. I work about 5 hours a day, every day, at them.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like they're a necessary but time-consuming part of making ends meet.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is true, but there are times when they are very few, so I do get out and walk, or run errands.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: So you do make an effort to get out when you can, that's a good start!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, but just feel sometimes, it's not enough.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like you're craving a bit more freedom and spontaneity in your life.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I suppose spontaneity is a good way to describe it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's nice to have some unexpected adventures and break the routine.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: But I always fall back to the earnings part, kind of think that's my priority.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Financial security can be a heavy weight, hard to shake off.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: True and the need to interact with other individuals.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Human connection is important, don't want to feel isolated.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Sometimes I think about going up to where all the elderly go, but not sure what I'd do there.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're thinking of a senior center or community?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes, that's it, did volunteer there years ago, then at the local hospital.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Nostalgic memories, maybe volunteering again could bring new purpose.
